Class Result

A static class for constructing Results in a more explicit way, if desired.

Inheritance
System.Object
Result
Namespace: FunctionalLink.Next
Assembly: FunctionalLink.Next.dll
Syntax
public static class Result : Object

Methods

Failure<T>(T)

Creates a Failure<T> with the given value. The Failure<T> type can be implicitly converted to Result<T> or a Result<T, _>

Declaration
public static Failure<T> Failure<T>(T value)
Parameters
Type Name Description
T value

The failure value
Returns
Type Description
Failure<T>

A Failure state that is implicitly convertible to a Result
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the failure

Success()

Creates a Success<T> with None as the value. The Success<T> type can be implicitly converted to Result<T> or a Result<T, _>. This is useful when you succeeded but have no value to return.

Declaration
public static Success<None> Success()
Returns
Type Description
Success<None>
